    Method
    Description
    List<Step>
    GetRequestScenarioMissingActorController.getRequestScenarioMissingActor(String scenarioContent)
    Handles GET requests to the "/scenario/missingactor" endpoint and returns a list of steps with missing actors for the scenario provided in the request body.
    List<Step>
    GetScenarioMissingActorController.getScenarioMissingActor(String title)
    Handles GET requests to the "/scenarios/{title}/missingactor" endpoint and returns a list of steps with missing actors for the stored scenario with the given title.
